item.title: Youda Camper
item.description:
Youda Camper is a simulation game in which you will manage the campsite of your dreams. Besides being the manager (and so, being able to build it the way you like) you have the goal of making sure the campers are happy so they keep coming more and more, bringing you more revenues. This way you will be able to expand your campsite.

Besides the tents, you can also build bungalows, parks, bingo halls, supermakets and playgrounds. Arrange the surrounding landscape, solve the campsite problems, and much more things that will keep you enjoying this game.
